attributes.action: Bring back Matron to our hospital wards
attributes.additional_details:
It all come down to when would you rather be in hospital now or when Matron was incharge of the ward. When she was around wards were clean and tidy. Family members knew who they could talk and so did the patients. Talk to anyone today and they have heard about an incident in a hospital near them it has to stop NOW

BRING BACK MATRON TO OUR WARDS
